subtitle:
1 00:00:00,000 --> 00:00:02,400 Choân-sè-kài thâu chi̍t-ê Tâi-gí la-la-tūi
The world's first Taigi cheerleading squad. 2 00:00:02,400 --> 00:00:05,000 ióng-sêng si̍t-kéng chiat-bo̍k "Chhài-chiáu-á Nice Play"
The training reality show "Rookie Nice Play" 3 00:00:05,000 --> 00:00:06,700 tī chit lé-pài-la̍k tiō beh hòng-sàng ah
will be broadcast this Saturday. 4 00:00:06,800 --> 00:00:09,500 Tùi saⁿ-pah ūi chham-sài-chiá lâi-bīn phà thong-koan
From 300 contestants battling through the selection rounds, 5 00:00:09,600 --> 00:00:10,400 kéng cha̍p ê chhut-lâi
ten were selected. 6 00:00:10,500 --> 00:00:13,000 in lóng sī m̄-bat chiap-chhiok kòe la-la-tūi ê chhài-chiáu-á
They are all rookies who have never been in a cheerleading squad before. 7 00:00:13,000 --> 00:00:15,400 Chit hôe lâi chham-ka Tâi-gí-tâi ê sin chiat-bo̍k
This time, participating in the new program on PTS Taigi, 8 00:00:15,400 --> 00:00:17,300 ná o̍h Tâi-gí ná o̍h thiàu-bú
they learn Tâi-gí and dancing at the same time, 9 00:00:17,300 --> 00:00:20,000 ia̍h í-keng khì kàu pāng-kiû-tiûⁿ o͘-en kúi-nā kái--lo͘h
and have already gone to the baseball stadium to cheer several times. 10 00:00:26,686 --> 00:00:28,400 Cha̍p ūi la-la-tūi ê chhài-chiáu-á
Ten cheerleading rookies 11 00:00:28,400 --> 00:00:29,400 pîn ka-tī ê gōng-táⁿ
are working extremely hard; 12 00:00:29,400 --> 00:00:30,800 ū lâng bô siáⁿ-mih ē-hiáu thiàu-bú
some didn't really know how to dance, 13 00:00:30,900 --> 00:00:33,300 kàu piàn-chò pāng-kiû la-la-tūi ê sêng-oân
but to become members of a baseball cheer squad, 14 00:00:33,400 --> 00:00:35,000 chi̍t pō͘ chi̍t pō͘ chiap-kīn bāng-sióng
they are approaching their dream step by step. 15 00:00:35,100 --> 00:00:37,000 Chū sè-hàn góa tō bô o̍h kòe thiàu-bú
"I haven't learned to dance since I was a child, 16 00:00:37,000 --> 00:00:38,100 góa lóng sī ka-kī o̍h ê
I am entirely self-taught, 17 00:00:38,200 --> 00:00:41,400 só͘-í khah tòe bē-tio̍h kî-thaⁿ ê lâng
so I can't keep up with the others easily, 18 00:00:41,500 --> 00:00:42,900 só͘-í tō ài ka-kī khah phah-piàⁿ--leh
therefore, I have to work harder on my own." 19 00:00:42,900 --> 00:00:46,500 Che sī Tâi-gí-tâi ê sin chiat-bo̍k "Chhài-chiáu-á Nice Play"
This is PTS Taigi's new show "Rookie Nice Play." 20 00:00:46,700 --> 00:00:49,000 tō chhin-chhiūⁿ Hân-kok liān-si̍p-seng kāng-khoán
Just like Korean trainees, 21 00:00:49,000 --> 00:00:51,000 chham-ka chiat-bo̍k chū-thâu khai-sí o̍h
they start learning from scratch after joining the show. 22 00:00:51,000 --> 00:00:52,400 Ài o̍h nn̄g hāng mi̍h-kiāⁿ
They have to learn two things: 23 00:00:52,500 --> 00:00:53,400 tē-it tō-sī thiàu-bú
first is dancing, 24 00:00:53,600 --> 00:00:54,600 tē-jī tō-sī Tâi-gí
second is Taigi. 25 00:00:54,700 --> 00:00:56,900 kiâm-sng khó͘-siap kóng bē liáu
The hardships are endless. 26 00:00:56,900 --> 00:00:58,800 Bô--lah góa Tâi-gí chiok nōa--ê
"No way, my Taigi sucks. 27 00:00:58,800 --> 00:00:59,800 lí khòaⁿ chiat-bo̍k lí tio̍h chai
You'll know if you watch the show. 28 00:00:59,800 --> 00:01:02,700 Tō khòaⁿ-tio̍h ha̍p-iok ū siá kóng
I just saw the contract said 29 00:01:02,700 --> 00:01:03,600 chia̍h-pn̄g m̄-bián chîⁿ
meals are free of charge, 30 00:01:03,600 --> 00:01:05,000 mā ū só͘-chāi thang tòa
and there is a place to stay." 31 00:01:05,000 --> 00:01:07,000 Ū lâng chham-ka sī ūi miâ-chheⁿ-bāng
Some joined for fame, 32 00:01:07,000 --> 00:01:08,600 ū lâng lâi chham-ka sī ūi lo̍k chiat-bo̍k
some came to record the show 33 00:01:08,600 --> 00:01:10,600 ū pau chia̍h koh pau tòa kài séng-chîⁿ
because food and housing are covered, saving a lot of money. 34 00:01:10,600 --> 00:01:13,000 Bóe-á sêng-kun ê chit cha̍p ūi chin bô kán-tan
Finally, these ten selected members are quite impressive; 35 00:01:13,100 --> 00:01:15,300 in sī tùi saⁿ-pah ūi ê chham-sài-chiá tiong
they were among the 300 contestants 36 00:01:15,300 --> 00:01:18,000 kòe thong-koan soán--chhut-lâi--ê
selected after passing through the rounds. 37 00:01:18,000 --> 00:01:19,100 Cha̍p ūi lāi-bīn ia̍h ū chi̍t ūi ûi-it ê lâm-sèng
Among the ten, there is also the sole male participant. 38 00:01:19,200 --> 00:01:21,200 Góa chū sè-hàn tō-sī hām A-má kóng Tâi-gí
"I've spoken Taigi with my grandma since I was little. 39 00:01:21,300 --> 00:01:22,000 Ko-hiông-lâng--mah
I'm from Kaohsiung, after all, 40 00:01:22,100 --> 00:01:24,100 jī-chhiáⁿ A-má lóng chiok siūⁿ-beh khòaⁿ-tio̍h góa
and Grandma really wanted to see me 41 00:01:24,200 --> 00:01:26,000 tī tiān-sī téng-koân piáu-ián
performing on television. 42 00:01:26,100 --> 00:01:27,300 In-ūi góa í-chêng sī kiû-oân
Because I used to be a [baseball] player, 43 00:01:27,400 --> 00:01:28,200 chham-ka chit-ê chiat-bo̍k
participating in this show 44 00:01:28,300 --> 00:01:29,600 ē-tàng hō͘ A-má khòaⁿ--tio̍h
allows Grandma to see me." 45 00:01:29,700 --> 00:01:32,300 Chit ki la-la-tūi m̄-sī kan-na ùn-tāu-iû niā-niā
This cheerleading squad isn't just messing around; 46 00:01:32,400 --> 00:01:34,100 sī chin-chiàⁿ ū lī-pō͘-chhit–ah
they have truly developed real skills. 47 00:01:34,200 --> 00:01:35,300 Chiat-bo̍k ia̍h te̍k-pia̍t phìn-chhiáⁿ
The show also specially hired 48 00:01:35,400 --> 00:01:38,000 saⁿ ūi la-la-tūi ê chiân-pòe lâi chò tō-su
three senior cheerleaders to serve as mentors. 49 00:01:38,000 --> 00:01:40,000 Ū Hân-kok la-la-tūi ê Lâm Bîn-cheng
Including South Korea's Nam Min-jeong, 50 00:01:40,000 --> 00:01:41,400 Lo̍k-thian Thô-oân ê Siáu-chêng
Rakuten Monkeys' Xiao Jing, 51 00:01:41,400 --> 00:01:44,500 hām Tiong-sìn Hiaⁿ-tī ê Si-si lâi thoân-siū phiat-pō͘
and CITIC Brothers' Xi-xi to teach the techniques, 52 00:01:44,500 --> 00:01:47,000 ū kà POSE--ê ia̍h ū cheng-sîn hoah-ōe
teaching posing and how to cheer up. 53 00:01:47,000 --> 00:01:49,300 Eh in choân-pō͘ lóng chìn-pō͘ chiok chōe--ê--neh
"Eh, they have all improved so much! 54 00:01:49,300 --> 00:01:51,900 téng-kái khòaⁿ--khí-lâi ná-chhiūⁿ in teh khó-chhì
Last time they looked like they were just taking an exam. 55 00:01:51,900 --> 00:01:53,800 Kin-á-ji̍t in ta̍k-ê lâng khòaⁿ--khí-lâi lóng án-ne
Today, every one of them looks like... 56 00:01:53,800 --> 00:01:55,800 O͘h, chiok ?--ê án-ne
oh, so sparkling and shiny!" 57 00:01:55,800 --> 00:01:58,300 Choân-sè-kài thâu chi̍t ki Tâi-gí la-la-tūi sêng-kun
The world's first Taigi cheerleading squad is formed, 58 00:01:58,400 --> 00:02:00,400 ióng-sêng ê kui-ê kòe-têng ia̍h lo̍k-chò chiat-bo̍k
and the entire training process has been recorded as a show. 59 00:02:00,500 --> 00:02:02,800 Kong-sī Tâi-gí-tâi "Chhài-chiáu-á Nice Play"
It is PTS Taigi's "Rookie Nice Play," 60 00:02:02,900 --> 00:02:04,900 tī chit-ê pài-la̍k àm-sî tiō beh pò-chhut
premiering this Saturday night. 61 00:02:05,000 --> 00:02:06,500 In ē iau-chhiáⁿ ta̍k-ke tàu-tīn
They invite everyone to come together 62 00:02:06,600 --> 00:02:08,400 lâi thè chit kóa chhài-chiáu-á ka-iû
and cheer for these rookies. 63 00:02:08,500 --> 00:02:12,000 Kì-chiá Tēⁿ A-soan, Lîm Io̍k-khái Tâi-pak pò-tō
Reporters Cheng A-suan and Lin Yu-kai, reporting from Taipei.
